original_title: De Vez em Quando, Quando Eu Morro, Eu Choro
overview: There was once a woman, Maria Laura, who used to come here to bang. One night, after a party, she came here with two guys. So, the day after, a bricklayer found her dead in a puddle of blood. Everyone who comes here has the habit to paint something in the wall if no, Maria Laura's ghost appears, rips person's head and hangs in her neck.
title: Every Once in a While When I Die I Cry
